title: Cockroach in cafeteria's food
content:
One of my friends got masala Puri from the cafeteria and found a dead cockroach inside it .
I was chill and returned it without saying anything and got a new one
Is there something which could have been done

comments.body: Yup. Stop eating at gjbc food court
Thereâ€™s 3 different ones, could you tell us which one exactly?
The main one which doesn't have a proper name at the end of the cafeteria as you enter and go straight
